name: Standing Poses
description: Poses performed while standing building strength and balance

name: Seated Poses
description: Poses performed while sitting opening hips and stretching hamstrings

name: Backbends
description: Poses that extend the back energizing and opening the front body

description: Poses that fold the body forward calming and stretching the back

name: Inversions
description: Poses with head below heart reversing perspective and building strength

name: Arm Balances
description: Poses supporting body weight on arms building upper body strength

name: Twists
description: Poses that rotate the spine aiding digestion and detoxification

name: Hip Openers
description: Poses that stretch and open the hip joints

name: Core Strengtheners
description: Poses that engage and strengthen abdominal muscles

name: Restorative
description: Passive poses using props for relaxation and healing

name: Meditation Poses
description: Seated poses designed for meditation and pranayama
